Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitCustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCustomerService
public interface FlipFitCustomerInterface
Interface for FlipFit Customer Business Logic. This interface defines various methods related to customer operations such as registering customers, viewing gyms, selecting gyms, booking slots, and viewing bookings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    bookGymSlot(int customerId)
    Allows the customer to book a gym slot.

    Registers a new customer.

    Allows the customer to select a gym.
    void
    viewAvailableSlots(List<FlipFitSlot> slots)
    Displays the available slots for a selected gym.
    void

    Displays the list of available gyms.
    void
    viewMyBookings(int customerId)
    Displays the bookings made by a customer.

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      void registerCustomer(int id, int age, String address) throws InvalidCustomerDataException
      Registers a new customer.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the customer.
      age - The age of the customer.
      address - The address of the customer.
      Throws:
      InvalidCustomerDataException - If the provided customer data is invalid.

    • viewGymList

      void viewGymList() throws NoGymsFoundException
      Displays the list of available gyms.
      Throws:
      NoGymsFoundException - If no gyms are available.

    • selectGym

      void selectGym() throws NoSlotsAvailableException, GymNotFoundException
      Allows the customer to select a gym.
      Throws:
      NoSlotsAvailableException - If no slots are available at the selected gym.
      GymNotFoundException - If the gym is not found.

    • viewAvailableSlots

      void viewAvailableSlots(List<FlipFitSlot> slots) throws NoSlotsAvailableException
      Displays the available slots for a selected gym.
      Parameters:
      slots - A list of available slots.
      Throws:
      NoSlotsAvailableException - If no slots are available.

    • bookGymSlot

      void bookGymSlot(int customerId) throws BookingFailedException
      Allows the customer to book a gym slot.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer booking the slot.
      Throws:
      BookingFailedException - If the booking process fails.

    • viewMyBookings

      void viewMyBookings(int customerId) throws NoBookingsFoundException
      Displays the bookings made by a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Throws:
      NoBookingsFoundException - If no bookings are found for the customer.
